author: cms-patatrack
body:
Note that the development of the Patatrack branch dates back at least to 10.1.x. Hopefully our development branch has been kept enough in sync with the master branch to avoid big conflicts.

Currently, not all the developments we would like to integrate have been merged in the development branch: see https://github.com/cms-patatrack/cmssw/issues/200 for the status of the Patatrack branch with respect to readiness for merging upstream.
title: [RFC] Proposal to merge the Patatrack development into CMSSW 10.4.x
